section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: The user group page displays all team members that belong to the user group. Additionally, Mingle administrators and project administrators can:

bullets.item: Add team members to the user group.
Remove team members from the user group.

subsection.title: Edit the user group name
subsection.note: Only Mingle administrators and project administrators can edit the user group name.
subsection.p: To edit the user group name:

item.p: Click the "edit" link next to the user group name.
Change the user group name name and click "Save".
The user group name will now be changed.

subsection.title: Add team members to the user group
subsection.note: Only Mingle administrators and project administrators can add team members to the user group.
subsection.p: To add team members to the user group:

item.p: Select the "Add group member" button. This will open a new page to add team members to the user group.

screenshot.alttext: Add team member to group button

item.p: Click on "Add to group" to add a team member to the user group.

note.p: Existing user group members will be shown, but you will not be able to add them to the user group again.
You can search for team members in the list.

screenshot.alttext: Add team member to user group

item.p: Click "Back to group" to return to the user group page.

screenshot.alttext: Add team member to user group

subsection.note: You can also add team members to user groups from the team list page.

subsection.title: Remove team members from the user group
subsection.note: Only Mingle administrators and project administrators can remove team members from the user group.
subsection.p: To remove team members from the user group:

item.p: Select the team members you want to remove from the user group.

screenshot.alttext: Select user group member to remove

item.p: Select the "Remove" button to remove the selected team members from the user group.

screenshot.alttext: Select user group member to remove

subsection.note: You can also remove team members from user groups from the team list page.
